title: The Gods Must Clearly Smile
description: From the distant future and the forgotten past…From the far reaches of space and the house next door…From award-winning author Aaron Christopher Drown, a collection of fourteen curious tales that wend and weave across worlds familiar and unthinkable—a captivating journey through wishes and nightmares, love and murder, war and magic, and the occasional dalliance with destiny.
author: Aaron Christopher Drown
